title: Side Effects of Parenting a Trans Child (with Jodie Patterson)
description:
This week, we talk to Jodie Patterson, mother, activist, and author of The Bold World, about raising her Black trans son.
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/smartfunnyandblack)!
~
